means: 宣传性地，不公平地，有倾向性地

sentence.Network_en: His analysis was rooted in a somewhat tendentious reading of French history.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的分析源于对法国历史带有一定偏见的解读。

sentence.Network_en: Such tendentious statements are likely to provoke strong opposition.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种有倾向性的说法可能招致强烈的反对.
她发表了有倾向性的讲话.

Such tendentious statements are likely to provoke strong opposition ., 这种有倾向性的说法可能招致强烈的反对.
but the discrete principle nature weakness and so on has the obvious tendentiousness in the utilization , to decide subjectively .但由于谨慎性原则在运用中具有明显的倾向性、主观臆断性等弱点。

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 20th cent.: suggested by German tendenziös

entry.tran: 有强烈倾向性的;有偏见的;有争议的
entry.def: Something that is tendentious expresses a particular opinion or point of view very strongly, especially one that many people disagree with.

example.ex: His analysis was rooted in a somewhat tendentious reading of French history.
example.tran: 他的分析源于对法国历史带有一定偏见的解读。

means.word_mean: 1. having or marked by a strong tendency especially a controversial one;

sentences.sentence: "distinguishing between verifiable fact and tendentious assertion"

auth_sentence.content: The tendentious Dr. Kolko is also unconvincing, in the opposite direction.
auth_sentence.res_content: The tendentious Dr. Kolko is also unconvincing, in the opposite direction.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The tendentious Dr. Kolko is also unconvincing, in the opposite direction.

auth_sentence.content: Ministers have accused Labour peers of filibustering by making long and sometimes tendentious speeches.
auth_sentence.res_content: Ministers have accused Labour peers of filibustering by making long and sometimes tendentious speeches.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Ministers have accused Labour peers of filibustering by making long and sometimes tendentious speeches.

auth_sentence.content: A tendentious and jazzed-up version of part of the lecture which had appeared in the local...press.
auth_sentence.res_content: A tendentious and jazzed-up version of part of the lecture which had appeared in the local...press.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A tendentious and jazzed-up version of part of the lecture which had appeared in the local...press.

means.word_mean: (指演说、文章等)宣传性的,有偏见的,不公平的,有倾向性的

sentences.en: a tendentious account of the recent elections
sentences.cn: 对近期选举有偏见的报导
